text: Thomas Eugene Beier (born June 23, 1945) is a former American football safety at the University of Miami (Florida) and professionally for the Miami Dolphins of the American Football League. He is a graduate of Saint Joseph Central Catholic High School in Fremont, Ohio. ==See also== * Other American Football League players Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:All- American college football players Category:American football safeties Category:Miami Dolphins players Category:Miami Hurricanes football players Category:People from Fremont, Ohio Category:Players of American football from Ohio Category:American Football League players
title: Tom Beier
